commitment.title: Our Commitment to GDPR
commitment.description: Doktu is fully committed to compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679. As a healthcare platform processing special category data under Article 9, we implement the highest standards of data protection.
commitment.registration: We are registered with the French Data Protection Authority (CNIL) and comply with all EU data protection regulations.
